titles.title: Holy God, We Praise Your Name

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Hark, the glad celestial hymn angel choirs above are raising; cherubim and seraphim, in unceasing chorus praising, fill the heav'ns with sweet accord: “Holy, holy, holy Lord!”

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Holy Father, Holy Son, Holy Spirit, three we name You, though in essence only one; undivided God, we claim You, and, adoring, bend the knee while we own the mystery.
